title: 3-year-old dies from self-inflicted gunshot wound, police say
content:
FLINT, MI -- A toddler is dead after police said he apparently found a loaded gun and accidentally shot himself late Wednesday night, Jan. 20.
Officers were called to the 1300 block of Columbia Lane, just north of downtown Flint near the intersection of Saginaw and Cornelia streets, at 11:24 p.m. Wednesday, Jan. 20.
Once there, officers found a 3-year-old with a single gunshot wound, according to Flint police.
The child was pronounced dead at the scene.
A preliminary investigation indicated the toddler found a loaded, unsecured weapon and that the gunshot wound was self-inflicted, according to a news release from the Flint Police Department.
No arrests were made, and the incident remains under investigation, police said.
